title: Crinme Alert 06.20.19
itunes:title: Crinme Alert 06.20.19
description:
Colorado man arrests thanks to DNA, 32 years after raping/strangling Army Specialist. Man threatens mass shooting at synagogues. Man arrested for stealing nearly a hundred pool floatings.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
